results.title: Simvastatin activates single skeletal RyR1 channels but exerts more complex regulation of the cardiac RyR2 isoform
results.text_hl: The ability of low concentrations of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ to reduce @GENE_100294532 @GENE_100294532 @@@RyR2@@@ Po may also protect against Ca2+-dependent @DISEASE_Arrhythmias_Cardiac @DISEASE_MESH:D001145 @@@arrhythmias@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Death_Sudden_Cardiac</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016757 @@@sudden cardiac death@@@.
